abstract: The highest resolution still image the system can produce for this format.
overview:
## Discussion

Normally, the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureStillImageOutput] class emits images with the same dimensions as the source [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureDevice] instance’s [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureDevice/activeFormat]. However, if you set `highResolutionStillImageOutputEnabled` to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureStillImageOutput] emits still images with its source [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureDevice] instance’s `activeFormat.highResolutionStillImageDimensions` dimensions.

# highResolutionStillImageDimensions

**Instance Property**

The highest resolution still image the system can produce for this format.

## Declaration

```swift
var highResolutionStillImageDimensions: CMVideoDimensions { get }
```

## Discussion

Normally, the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureStillImageOutput] class emits images with the same dimensions as the source [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureDevice] instance’s [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureDevice/activeFormat]. However, if you set `highResolutionStillImageOutputEnabled` to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureStillImageOutput] emits still images with its source [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureDevice] instance’s `activeFormat.highResolutionStillImageDimensions` dimensions.
title: highResolutionStillImageDimensions
